structure.unit: ARTICLE IV. COMMUNITY ANTENNA TELEVISION SYSTEMS

law.catch_line: Review of the County Manager's decisions.

text.section:
Sec. 8A-128.6. Review of the County Manager's decisions.
All decisions of the County Manager shall be subject to review by the Miami-Dade County Commission. Appeals from the Commission's decisions shall be by compliance with the appropriate Florida Appellate Rules. Service on the County Manager may be made by serving the County Manager or other party designated by him to accept service and serving a copy of said service with the County Attorney.
